Package bomberman.core.logic

Interface Summary
MoveStrategy The MoveStrategy interface provides base methods to define the class of autonomous movement strategies for Enemy and DynamicPhysicsEntity instances.
PhysicsEntity An interface for entities that have an associated Body for modeling their physical interactions.
PhysicsEntity.HasContactListener A marker interface for whether this physics entity listens for contact with other entities.
 

Class Summary
Block The Block class defines an abstract piece of world's ground.
Bomb The Bomb class defines the logic structure of a bomb.
Bomber The Bomber class defines the logic structure of the BomberMan character.
BrickBlock The BrickBlock class extends Block.
DynamicPhysicsEntity The subclass of Entity that handles interactions with the Box2d physics engine and updates the state of the entity as time passes.
Entity The Entity class represent a base class of logic objects acting in a LogicWorld.
EntityEngine The class for managing the interaction of Entity instances via the.
FireEntity The FireEntity class represents the flame that comes up with the explosion produced by a Bomb.
FreeBlock The FreeBlock class represent a free piece of ground.
LogicWorld The class responsible for managing all logic game-related aspects during a single round of game play.
ScoreManager The ScoreManager class manages the player's score during the game.
Strategy1 The Strategy1 class is an implementation of the MoveStrategy interface.
Strategy2 The Strategy2 class is an implementation of the MoveStrategy interface.
WallBlock The WallBlock class extends the Block class.
 

Enum Summary
Direction The Enumeration of the allowed spatial directions in the game.
State The State enum represents the states that an Entity can assume.
